name: Tomato Sauce With Lamb and Pasta
recipeCategory: dinner, quick, pastas, sauces and gravies
keywords: canned tomatoes, lamb shanks, pappardelle, main course
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup lamb juice from Slow-Braised Lamb Shanks

1 28-ounce can tomatoes, chopped
or crushed, with their liquid
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text:
Cook the onions in the oil over medium
heat, stirring until very soft, about 20
minutes. Add the thyme, garlic, pepper
flakes, lamb juice and tomatoes and cook,
stirring, until saucy, about 20 minutes.

Stir in the meat and continue to cook,
seasoning as necessary, until flavors meld,
at least 15 minutes. Cook the pasta and
serve with the sauce; garnish with cheese.
